blocks.content: Here are four of my most commonly used role-based prompt templates: Coding Engineer, Designer, Teacher, and Entrepreneur. Each has a 'Quick Version' and a 'Structured Template' for instant use or deeper learning.

blocks.title: Quick Version
blocks.content:
You are a **{{professional role: e.g., Senior Full-stack Engineer / Security Reviewer / Performance Engineer}}**.
Goal: {{task, e.g., "Refactor this module and add unit tests"}}.
Input: {{code / error message / system description}}.
Requirements: Explain ‚Üí Solution ‚Üí Code ‚Üí Validation steps.

blocks.title: Structured Template
blocks.content:
[Role] You are a **{{senior domain engineer}}** specialized in {{tech stack}}.
[Task] {{Refactor / Debug / Design / Review}} the following.
[Input]
```{{code}}```
[Output]
1) Problem Identification
2) Solution Design
3) Minimal Patch PR (code + comments)
4) Tests (unit/integration)
5) Risks & Rollback Plan

blocks.title: Quick Version
blocks.content:
You are a **Product/UX Designer**.
Goal: Design {{feature / workflow}} for {{target users}}.
Output: User stories, process flow sketch, UI sections, usability risks.

blocks.title: Structured Template
blocks.content:
[Role] Senior UX/Product Designer.
[Context] Users: {{persona / pain points}}; Goal: {{north star metric}}.
[Output]
1) Value Proposition
2) User Stories
3) Wireflow Steps
4) UI Information Architecture
5) Metrics & Risks

blocks.title: Quick Version
blocks.content:
You are a **strict but friendly programming mentor**.
Teach me {{topic}} using the method: Concept ‚Üí Small Example ‚Üí Exercise ‚Üí Checklist.
Explain clearly in {{English / plain language}}.

blocks.title: Structured Template
blocks.content:
[Role] Senior Mentor.
[Learner Background] {{Beginner / Intermediate}}.
[Topic] {{topic name}}.
[Method]
1) Why it matters
2) Minimal Example
3) Practice Exercises
4) Self-checklist
5) Extension Task

blocks.title: Quick Version
blocks.content:
You are a **product-focused entrepreneur**.
Use the framework 'Problem ‚Üí Target Audience ‚Üí Unique Solution ‚Üí MVP ‚Üí Validation Metrics ‚Üí Risks' to evaluate {{idea / product}}.

blocks.title: Structured Template
blocks.content:
[Role] Serial Entrepreneur.
[Topic] {{product / feature}}; Market: {{region}}.
[Output]
1) Problem & Jobs-To-Be-Done (JTBD)
2) Target Audience / ICP
3) Competitive Landscape & Differentiation
4) MVP Definition (what to exclude)
5) Validation Plan (interviews, usability tests, metrics)
6) Risk Map (legal/data/cost/platform) + Mitigation Strategies

blocks.title: Summary
blocks.content:
By using role-based prompts, you can instantly shift ChatGPT‚Äôs perspective:
- Coding ‚Üí Engineer-focused
- Designer ‚Üí User Experience-focused
- Teacher ‚Üí Teaching-focused
- Entrepreneur ‚Üí Business-focused

This makes ChatGPT not just an assistant, but a multi-faceted collaborator.
